article.title: Kongsberg to Support Remotely Operated Weapon Station
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Kongsberg Defence & Aerospace, Kongsberg, Norway, was awarded an $85 million firm-fixed-price to procure spare parts and services in support of the Common Remotely Operated Weapon Station. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
